item.title: Permanently show the Hibernate button in Windows XP
item.description: You like to hibernate your Windows system instead of always turning it off? Me too! You still have to reboot or power off from time to time otherwise the system would slow down but at least sometimes you don’t have to wait for the lengthy Windows boot. This is how you can configure Windows XP to always show the Hibernate button when clicking Turn Off like it shows on some laptops.
